languages.text: {n}Мастер дисциплины свирепо смотрит на вокс-установку.{/n} "Блюстители... исполнят свой долг. Ожидайте прибытия подмоги".
{n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины свирепо смотрит на вокс-установку.{/n} "Блюстители... исполнят свой долг. Ожидайте прибытия подмоги".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-unit.{/n} "The enforcers... Will do their duty. Wait for the reinforcements."

{n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas fulmina el voco amplificador con la mirada.{/n} «El personal de seguridad... cumplirá su deber. La ayuda está en camino».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas fulmina el voco amplificador con la mirada.{/n} «El personal de seguridad... cumplirá su deber. La ayuda está en camino».

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズが、キッと音声通信送受信装置を睨みつける。{/n} 「エンフォーサーは…任務を遂行せよ。支援がまもなく到着する」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズが、キッと音声通信送受信装置を睨みつける。{/n} 「エンフォーサーは…任務を遂行せよ。支援がまもなく到着する」

languages.text: {n}戒律大师愤怒地瞪着通讯器。{/n}“执法者……会认真履行职责，援军很快就到了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师愤怒地瞪着通讯器。{/n}“执法者……会认真履行职责，援军很快就到了。”

languages.text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms starrt den Vox-Transmitter zornig an.{/n} "Die Enforcers ... werden ihre Pflicht tun. Es wird bald Hilfe eintreffen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms starrt den Vox-Transmitter zornig an.{/n} "Die Enforcers ... werden ihre Pflicht tun. Es wird bald Hilfe eintreffen."

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes foudroie l'émetteur vox du regard.{/n} « Les prévôts... feront leur devoir. Les renforts sont en route. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes foudroie l'émetteur vox du regard.{/n} « Les prévôts... feront leur devoir. Les renforts sont en route. »

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, öfkeyle voksyayara bakıyor.{/n} "İnfazcılar... Vazifelerini yerine getireceklerdir. Yardım yakında ulaşacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms glares furiously at the vox-caster.{/n} "The enforcers... will do their duty. Aid will arrive shortly."
